title: Metaverse
summary:
The document provides an overview of two metaverse projects:

Cyberverse is an open-world, pixel-based game with blockchain integration on the Ergo blockchain, allowing for unique player experiences. 

SigmaValley, the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain, aims to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem, inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series.

qa_pairs.question: What is Cyberverse?
qa_pairs.answer: Cyberverse is an open-world, pixel-based game filled with various opportunities to socialize with others and earn while doing so, integrating with the Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the vision of Cyberverse?
qa_pairs.answer: The vision of Cyberverse is to have an open world pixel game, fit with blockchain integration to allow for unique player experiences using Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaValley is the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain, aiming to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem, inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series Intro.

qa_pairs.question: What is the status of SigmaValley?
What blockchain is Cyberverse integrated with?
qa_pairs.answer: Cyberverse is integrated with the Ergo Blockchain.
